row.text: (Richardo), archiepiscopo Cantuariensi, mandat, hospitalarios et templarios sub excommunicationis poena moneat, „ut si quos in excommunicatione defunctos in coemeteriis ecclesiarum sepelierint, eos eiiciant“. Gilberti Foliot epist. ed. Giles II. 64, Migne 200 p. 1017, (App. conc. Lat. XXXI. 5, Coll. Lips. XII. 3, Coll. Cass. XXIII. 3, Coll. Bamb. XIII. 3, Comp. I. I. 5. t. 28. c. 6, Decr. Greg. L. V. t. 33. c. 5). — „Ad hoc in beatorum“ „Ad haec in“. 36
